name: Alien Space Invasion
description:
WASD To Move / Mouse Left Down And Space To Shoot.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome To Alien Space Invasion. Shoot Alien Shuttles And Kill Them All. Who Can Get The Most Points?? Don't Loose Health As You May Die. There Are 2 Skins To Choose From But Will Be More Incoming. Enjoy My Game And Have Fun.

This Is V.1.2 (Version One Point Two) (Art Update)

PLZ Note: This Update Doesn't Change The Gameplay Just The Looks.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

In This Version:

All New Art

2 Characters (With New Art)

A Custom Curser That You Can Turn On And Off (With New Art)

Health (With New Art)

New Bullet Sprite

New Enemy Sprite

New Button Sprites

New Backdrops

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Removed:

Achievements

Old Art

Locker (Because Of Bugs)
